text: Bob Van Der Veken (26 September 1928 – 18 February 2019) was a Belgian actor. == Early life == A familiar face on Belgian television, Van Der Veken's career began in 1956. He made well over 100 appearances. One of his most popular roles was that of Paul Thienpondt in the comedy series De Collega's. More recently, he has appeared in such popular Belgian TV series as Spoed, Alle maten, and Lili & Marleen. In 1992, he directed the television series Caravans. ==Filmography== ===2000s=== *Het is ene van ons (2006) TV Episode .... Meneer Joost :....
